instruction: Please conduct a comparison between the UPM 2028 and Orsted 2029 bonds, focusing on their financed-emissions estimates and how they relate to the green bond metric.
output: After comparing the UPM 2028 and Orsted 2029 bonds, it is evident that while they have similar yields and durations, their financed-emissions estimates differ significantly. The UPM bond has a higher financed-emissions estimate, indicating that the issuer may have a larger carbon footprint compared to Orsted. This information is important when assessing the environmental impact of green bonds and can be used to distinguish between green bonds issued by different firms.
